elements.name: dap-ds-accordion
elements.description:
An accordion is a vertically stacked list of interactive items that can be expanded or collapsed to reveal or hide content.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-opened** - Event fired when the accordion is opened.
- **dds-closed** - Event fired when the accordion is closed.

### **Slots:**
 - **default** - The content of the accordion.
- **heading** - The heading of the accordion.
- **icon-opened** - The icon when the accordion is opened.
- **icon-closed** - The icon when the accordion is closed.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-accordion-border-width** - The width of the accordion border (default: var(--dds-border-width-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-border-style** - The style of the accordion border (default: solid) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-border-radius** - The border radius of the accordion (default: var(--dds-radius-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-border-color** - The color of the accordion border (default: var(--dds-border-neutral-divider)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-background-color** - The background color of the accordion (default: var(--dds-background-neutral-subtle)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-text-color** - The text color of the accordion (default: var(--dds-text-neutral-strong)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-hover-background** - The background color when hovering over the accordion (default: var(--dds-background-neutral-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-active-background** - The background color when the accordion is active (default: var(--dds-background-neutral-medium)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-icon-background** - The background color of the accordion icon (default: var(--dds-transparent-black-subtle)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-icon-color** - The color of the accordion icon (default: var(--dds-icon-neutral-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-icon-hover-background** - The background color of the accordion icon when hovered (default: var(--dds-transparent-black-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-icon-active-background** - The background color of the accordion icon when active (default: var(--dds-transparent-black-strong)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-icon-hover-color** - The color of the accordion icon when hovered (default: var(--dds-icon-neutral-strong)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-icon-active-color** - The color of the accordion icon when active (default: var(--dds-icon-neutral-strong)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-content-color** - The color of the accordion content (default: var(--dds-text-text-neutral)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-transition-duration** - The duration of the accordion transitions (default: var(--dds-transition-fast)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-transition-timing** - The timing function of the accordion transitions (default: var(--dds-easing-ease-in-out)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-divider-color** - The color of the divider between accordion items (default: var(--dds-border-neutral-divider)) _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main accordion container.
- **heading** - The heading of the accordion.
- **button** - The button of the accordion.
- **content** - The content of the accordion.
- **content-container** - The container of the accordion content.
- **icon-wrapper** - The icon wrapper of the accordion.
- **open-icon** - The icon when the accordion is opened.
- **open-icon-base** - The base of the icon when the accordion is opened.
- **close-icon** - The icon when the accordion is closed.
- **close-icon-base** - The base of the icon when the accordion is closed.

elements.name: dap-ds-accordion-group
elements.description:
An accordion group is a collection of accordion components.
---


### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the accordion group.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-accordion-group-spacing** - Controls the gap between accordion items (default: var(--dds-spacing-300)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-group-border-color** - Controls the border color (default: var(--dds-border-neutral-subtle)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-group-border-width** - Controls the border width (default: var(--dds-border-width-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-group-border-radius** - Controls the border radius (default: var(--dds-radius-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-accordion-group-background** - Controls the background color (default: transparent) _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main accordion group container.

attributes.description: Whether to close other accordions when one is opened.

attributes.description: The variant of the accordion

properties.description: Whether to close other accordions when one is opened.

properties.description: The variant of the accordion

elements.name: dap-ds-avatar-group
elements.description:
Avatar group component displays multiple avatars in an organized layout with overflow management.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-overflow-click** - Fired when the overflow indicator is clicked.

### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The avatars to display in the group.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-avatar-group-gap** - Gap between avatars in grid layout. Default is 0. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-group-overlap** - Overlap amount for stacked layout. Default is -8px. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-group-border-width** - Border width for avatars. Default is 2px. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-group-border-color** - Border color for avatars. Default is white. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-group-overflow-bg** - Background color for overflow indicator. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-group-overflow-color** - Text color for overflow indicator. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-group-overflow-border** - Border for overflow indicator. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-group-size-lg** - Size for large avatars. Default is 80px. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-group-size-md** - Size for medium avatars. Default is 64px. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-group-size-sm** - Size for small avatars. Default is 48px. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-group-size-xs** - Size for extra small avatars. Default is 32px. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-group-size-xxs** - Size for extra extra small avatars. Default is 24px. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main container of the avatar group.
- **avatars** - The container for the visible avatars.
- **overflow** - The overflow indicator element.

elements.name: dap-ds-avatar
elements.description:
Avatar component can be used to display user profile images, initials, or icons.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-click** - Fired when the avatar is clicked (only when interactive).
- **dds-load** - Fired when the image loads successfully.
- **dds-error** - Fired when the image fails to load.

### **Slots:**
 - **icon** - The icon to display when variant is 'icon'.
- **fallback** - Custom fallback content when image fails to load.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-avatar-border-radius** - The border radius of the avatar. Default varies by shape. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-background-color** - The background color of the avatar. Default is neutral. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-border-width** - The width of the avatar's border. Default is 0. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-border-color** - The color of the avatar's border. Default is transparent. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-border-style** - The style of the avatar's border. Default is solid. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-transition** - The transition property for the avatar. Default is 'all 0.2s ease-in-out'. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-text-color** - The color of initials text. Default is neutral strong. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-font-size** - The font size for initials. Calculated based on size. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-font-weight** - The font weight for initials. Default is semibold. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-size-lg** - The size of the large avatar. Default is 80px. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-size-md** - The size of the medium avatar. Default is 64px. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-size-sm** - The size of the small avatar. Default is 48px. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-size-xs** - The size of the extra small avatar. Default is 32px. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-avatar-size-xxs** - The size of the extra extra small avatar. Default is 24px. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main avatar container.
- **img** - The avatar image.
- **initials** - The initials container.
- **icon** - The icon container.
- **fallback** - The fallback content container.
- **loading** - The loading indicator.

elements.name: dap-ds-badge
elements.description:
A badge is a small status descriptor for UI elements.
---


### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the badge.
- **icon** - The icon of the badge.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-badge-border-width** - The width of the badge's border. Default is the design system's base border width. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-border-style** - The style of the badge's border. Default is solid. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-border-radius** - The border radius of the badge. Default is the design system's base radius. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-font-weight** - The font weight of the badge text. Default is bold. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-line-height** - The line height of the badge text. Default is 1.2. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-transition** - The transition property for the badge. Default is 'all 0.2s ease-in-out'. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-padding-sm** - The padding of the small badge. Default is the design system's spacing-100 and spacing-200. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-padding-lg** - The padding of the large badge. Default is the design system's spacing-100 and spacing-300. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-font-size-sm** - The font size of the small badge. Default is the design system's font-xs. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-font-size-lg** - The font size of the large badge. Default is the design system's font-sm. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-neutral-border-color** - The border color of the neutral badge. Default is the design system's border-neutral-base. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-neutral-background** - The background color of the neutral badge. Default is the design system's background-neutral-medium. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-neutral-color** - The text color of the neutral badge. Default is the design system's text-neutral-subtle. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-brand-border-color** - The border color of the brand badge. Default is the design system's border-brand-base. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-brand-background** - The background color of the brand badge. Default is the design system's background-brand-medium. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-brand-color** - The text color of the brand badge. Default is the design system's text-brand-subtle. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-info-border-color** - The border color of the info badge. Default is the design system's border-informative-base. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-info-background** - The background color of the info badge. Default is the design system's background-informative-medium. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-info-color** - The text color of the info badge. Default is the design system's text-informative-subtle. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-positive-border-color** - The border color of the positive badge. Default is the design system's border-positive-base. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-positive-background** - The background color of the positive badge. Default is the design system's background-positive-medium. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-positive-color** - The text color of the positive badge. Default is the design system's text-positive-subtle. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-warning-border-color** - The border color of the warning badge. Default is the design system's border-warning-subtle. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-warning-background** - The background color of the warning badge. Default is the design system's background-warning-medium. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-warning-color** - The text color of the warning badge. Default is the design system's text-warning-subtle. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-negative-border-color** - The border color of the negative badge. Default is the design system's border-negative-base. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-negative-background** - The background color of the negative badge. Default is the design system's background-negative-medium. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-negative-color** - The text color of the negative badge. Default is the design system's text-negative-subtle. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main container of the badge.
- **icon** - The icon of the badge.
- **content** - The content of the badge.
- **icon-base** - The base of the icon.

elements.name: dap-ds-anchor-heading
elements.description:
Anchor heading is a heading with an anchor link.
---


### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-anchor-link-color** - The color of the anchor link. Default is the primary color. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-anchor-link-opacity** - The opacity of the anchor link when not hovered. Default is 0. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-anchor-link-hover-opacity** - The opacity of the anchor link when hovered. Default is 1. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-anchor-link-transition** - The transition property for the anchor link opacity. Default is 'opacity 0.2s ease-in-out'. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main anchor heading container.
- **link** - The link of the anchor heading. dap-ds-link element.
- **link-base** - The base of the link part.
- **text** - The text of the anchor heading.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: The variant of the heading. Default is `h2`. Can be `h1`, `h2`, `h3`, `h4`, `h5`, or `h6`.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The label of the heading.

elements.name: dap-ds-banner
elements.description:
A banner is a message displayed at the top of the page to provide important information to the user.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-close** - Event fired when the banner is closed.

### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the banner.
- **actions** - Actions of banner
- **icon** - The icon of the banner.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-banner-gap** - The gap between banner elements. Default is the design system's spacing-200. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-line-height** - The line height of the banner text. Default is the design system's font-line-height-xlarge. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-transition** - The transition property for the banner. Default is 'all 0.2s ease-in-out'. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-brand-background** - The background color of the brand banner. Default is the design system's banner-background-brand. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-brand-icon-color** - The color of the brand banner icon. Default is the design system's banner-icon-brand. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-brand-text-color** - The text color of the brand banner. Default is the design system's banner-text-brand. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-brand-action-color** - The color of the brand banner actions. Default is the design system's banner-action-enabled. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-info-background** - The background color of the info banner. Default is the design system's banner-background-informative. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-info-icon-color** - The color of the info banner icon. Default is the design system's banner-icon-informative. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-info-text-color** - The text color of the info banner. Default is the design system's banner-text-informative. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-info-action-color** - The color of the info banner actions. Default is the design system's banner-action-enabled. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-positive-background** - The background color of the positive banner. Default is the design system's banner-background-positive. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-positive-icon-color** - The color of the positive banner icon. Default is the design system's banner-icon-positive. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-positive-text-color** - The text color of the positive banner. Default is the design system's banner-text-positive. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-positive-action-color** - The color of the positive banner actions. Default is the design system's banner-action-enabled. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-warning-background** - The background color of the warning banner. Default is the design system's banner-background-warning. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-warning-icon-color** - The color of the warning banner icon. Default is the design system's banner-icon-warning. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-warning-text-color** - The text color of the warning banner. Default is the design system's banner-text-warning. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-warning-action-color** - The color of the warning banner actions. Default is the design system's banner-action-inverted-enabled. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-negative-background** - The background color of the negative banner. Default is the design system's banner-background-negative. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-negative-icon-color** - The color of the negative banner icon. Default is the design system's banner-icon-negative. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-negative-text-color** - The text color of the negative banner. Default is the design system's banner-text-negative. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-banner-negative-action-color** - The color of the negative banner actions. Default is the design system's banner-action-inverted-enabled. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main banner container.
- **card-base** - The wrapper card container.
- **icon** - The icon of the banner.
- **icon-element** - The icon element of the banner.
- **icon-base** - The base of the icon.
- **closebutton** - The close button of the banner.
- **close-icon-element** - The icon element of the close button.
- **close-icon-base** - The base of the close button icon.
- **actions** - The actions of the banner.
- **title** -  The title of the banner.

elements.name: dap-ds-breadcrumb
elements.description:
A breadcrumb is a secondary navigation scheme that reveals the user's location in a website or Web application.
---


### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the breadcrumb.
- **separator** - The separator between breadcrumb items. Default is '/'.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-breadcrumb-width** - The width of the breadcrumb container. Default is 100%. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-overflow-x** - The horizontal overflow behavior of the breadcrumb. Default is auto. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-transition** - The transition property for the breadcrumb. Default is 'all 0.2s ease-in-out'. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-list-display** - The display property of the breadcrumb list. Default is flex. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-list-flex-wrap** - The flex-wrap property of the breadcrumb list. Default is nowrap. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-list-align-items** - The align-items property of the breadcrumb list. Default is center. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-list-min-width** - The minimum width of the breadcrumb list. Default is max-content. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main breadcrumb container.
- **separator** - The separator of the breadcrumb.

attributes.description: Mobile version of the breadcrumb

attributes.name: aria-labelledby
attributes.description: The aria-labelledby of the breadcrumb

slots.description: The content of the breadcrumb.

slots.name: separator
slots.description: The separator between breadcrumb items. Default is '/'.

properties.name: mobile
properties.description: Mobile version of the breadcrumb

properties.name: ariaLabelledBy
properties.description: The aria-labelledby of the breadcrumb

elements.name: dap-ds-breadcrumb-item
elements.description:
A breadcrumb item is a secondary navigation scheme that reveals the user's location in a website or Web application.
---


### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the breadcrumb item.
- **separator** - The separator between breadcrumb items. Default is an arrow-right-s-line icon.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-breadcrumb-item-display** - The display property of the breadcrumb item. Default is inline-flex. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-item-flex-wrap** - The flex-wrap property of the breadcrumb item. Default is nowrap. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-item-align-items** - The align-items property of the breadcrumb item. Default is center. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-item-color** - The text color of the breadcrumb item. Default is the design system's text-neutral-base. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-item-transition** - The transition property for the breadcrumb item. Default is 'all 0.2s ease-in-out'. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-item-gap** - The gap between the breadcrumb item and the separator. Default is the design system's spacing-200. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-item-padding** - The padding of the breadcrumb item. Default is the design system's spacing-200. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-item-font-size** - The font size of the breadcrumb item. Default is the design system's font-sm. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-item-font-weight** - The font weight of the breadcrumb item. Default is the design system's font-weight-medium. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-item-font-weight-bold** - The bold font weight of the breadcrumb item. Default is the design system's font-weight-bold. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-item-separator-color** - The color of the separator. Default is the design system's text-neutral-disabled. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-item-link-color** - The color of the link. Default is the design system's link-neutral-enabled. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-item-inverted-color** - The text color when inverted. Default is the design system's text-neutral-inverted. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-breadcrumb-item-inverted-link-color** - The link color when inverted. Default is the design system's text-neutral-inverted. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main breadcrumb item container. The li element.
- **link** - The link of the breadcrumb item. The dds-link component.
- **link-base** - The base part of the link part. The dds-link components base part.
- **item-nolink** - The item of the breadcrumb item without a link. The span element.
- **separator** - The separator of the breadcrumb item.

elements.name: dap-ds-button
elements.description:
A button is a clickable element that can be used to trigger an action, submit forms, or navigate to other pages.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-loading-timeout** - Emitted when the loading timeout is reached

### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the button. Can contain text, icons, or other elements.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-button-padding-x** - Horizontal padding of the button (default: var(--dds-spacing-300)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-padding-y** - Vertical padding of the button (default: var(--dds-spacing-300)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-border-radius** - Border radius of the button (default: var(--dds-radius-rounded)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-font-weight** - Font weight of the button (default: 700) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-line-height** - Line height of the button (default: var(--dds-font-line-height-large)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-transition** - Transition property of the button (default: all 0.2s ease-in-out) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-disabled-opacity** - Opacity of disabled button (default: 0.5) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-size-lg** - Size of large button (default: var(--dds-spacing-1200)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-size-md** - Size of medium button (default: var(--dds-spacing-1000)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-size-sm** - Size of small button (default: var(--dds-spacing-800)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-size-xs** - Size of extra small button (default: var(--dds-spacing-600)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-circle-lg** - Size of large circle button (default: var(--dds-spacing-1200)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-circle-md** - Size of medium circle button (default: var(--dds-spacing-1000)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-circle-sm** - Size of small circle button (default: var(--dds-spacing-800)) _(default: undefined)_

- **--dds-button-primary-color-bg** - Background color of primary button (default: var(--dds-button-primary-background-enabled)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-primary-color-bg-hover** - Background color of primary button on hover (default: var(--dds-button-primary-background-hover)) _(default: undefined)_

- **--dds-button-primary-color-bg-disabled** - Background color of disabled primary button (default: var(--dds-button-primary-background-disabled)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-primary-color-text** - Text color of primary button (default: var(--dds-button-primary-text-enabled)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-primary-color-text-disabled** - Text color of disabled primary button (default: var(--dds-button-primary-text-disabled)) Primary inverted button properties: _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-primary-inverted-color-bg** - Background color of primary inverted button (default: var(--dds-button-primary-background-inverted-enabled)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-primary-inverted-color-bg-hover** - Background color of primary inverted button on hover (default: var(--dds-button-primary-background-inverted-hover)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-primary-inverted-color-bg-active** - Background color of primary inverted button when active (default: var(--dds-button-primary-background-inverted-pressed)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-primary-inverted-color-bg-disabled** - Background color of disabled primary inverted button (default: var(--dds-button-primary-background-inverted-disabled)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-primary-inverted-color-text** - Text color of primary inverted button (default: var(--dds-button-primary-text-inverted)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-primary-inverted-color-text-disabled** - Text color of disabled primary inverted button (default: var(--dds-button-primary-text-inverted-disabled)) Outline button properties: _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-outline-color-border** - Border color of outline button (default: var(--dds-button-outline-border-enabled)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-outline-color-border-hover** - Border color of outline button on hover (default: var(--dds-button-outline-border-hover)) _(default: undefined)_

- **--dds-button-outline-color-border-disabled** - Border color of disabled outline button (default: var(--dds-button-outline-border-disabled)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-outline-color-text** - Text color of outline button (default: var(--dds-button-outline-text-enabled)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-outline-color-text-hover** - Text color of outline button on hover (default: var(--dds-button-outline-text-hover)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-outline-color-text-active** - Text color of outline button when active (default: var(--dds-button-outline-text-pressed)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-outline-color-text-disabled** - Text color of disabled outline button (default: var(--dds-button-outline-text-disabled)) Outline inverted button properties: _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-outline-inverted-color-border** - Border color of outline inverted button (default: var(--dds-button-outline-border-inverted-enabled)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-outline-inverted-color-border-hover** - Border color of outline inverted button on hover (default: var(--dds-button-outline-border-inverted-hover)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-outline-inverted-color-border-active** - Border color of outline inverted button when active (default: var(--dds-button-outline-border-inverted-pressed)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-outline-inverted-color-border-disabled** - Border color of disabled outline inverted button (default: var(--dds-button-outline-border-inverted-disabled)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-outline-inverted-color-text** - Text color of outline inverted button (default: var(--dds-button-outline-text-inverted-enabled)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-outline-inverted-color-text-hover** - Text color of outline inverted button on hover (default: var(--dds-button-outline-text-inverted-hover)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-outline-inverted-color-text-active** - Text color of outline inverted button when active (default: var(--dds-button-outline-text-inverted-pressed)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-outline-inverted-color-text-disabled** - Text color of disabled outline inverted button (default: var(--dds-button-outline-text-inverted-disabled)) Subtle button properties: _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-subtle-color-bg** - Background color of subtle button (default: var(--dds-button-subtle-background-enabled)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-subtle-color-bg-hover** - Background color of subtle button on hover (default: var(--dds-button-subtle-background-hover)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-subtle-color-bg-active** - Background color of subtle button when active (default: var(--dds-button-subtle-background-pressed)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-subtle-color-bg-disabled** - Background color of disabled subtle button (default: var(--dds-button-subtle-background-disabled)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-subtle-color-border** - Border color of subtle button (default: var(--dds-button-subtle-border-enabled)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-subtle-color-border-hover** - Border color of subtle button on hover (default: var(--dds-button-subtle-border-hover)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-subtle-color-border-active** - Border color of subtle button when active (default: var(--dds-button-subtle-border-pressed)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-subtle-color-border-disabled** - Border color of disabled subtle button (default: var(--dds-button-subtle-border-disabled)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-subtle-color-text** - Text color of subtle button (default: var(--dds-button-subtle-text-enabled)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-subtle-color-text-hover** - Text color of subtle button on hover (default: var(--dds-button-subtle-text-hover)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-subtle-color-text-active** - Text color of subtle button when active (default: var(--dds-button-subtle-text-pressed)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-subtle-color-text-disabled** - Text color of disabled subtle button (default: var(--dds-button-subtle-text-disabled)) Clean button properties: _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-clean-color-text** - Text color of clean button (default: var(--dds-text-link-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-clean-color-text-hover** - Text color of clean button on hover (default: var(--dds-text-link-hover)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-clean-color-text-active** - Text color of clean button when active (default: var(--dds-text-link-pressed)) _(default: undefined)_

- **--dds-button-clean-inverted-color-text-active** - Text color of clean inverted button when active (default: var(--dds-button-primary-text-inverted)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-clean-inverted-color-text-disabled** - Text color of disabled clean inverted button (default: var(--dds-text-neutral-disabled)) Danger button properties: _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-danger-color-bg** - Background color of danger button (default: var(--dds-button-primary-background-destructive-enabled)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-danger-color-bg-hover** - Background color of danger button on hover (default: var(--dds-button-primary-background-destructive-hover)) _(default: undefined)_

- **--dds-button-danger-outline-color-text-active** - Text color of danger outline button when active (default: var(--dds-button-outline-text-destructive-pressed)) _(default: undefined)_

- **--dds-button-danger-subtle-color-text-active** - Text color of danger subtle button when active (default: var(--dds-button-subtle-text-destructive-pressed)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-button-danger-clean-color-text** - Text color of danger clean button (default: var(--dds-text-negative-subtle)) _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**

- **high-contrast** - The high contrast part of the button.
- **content** - The content wrapper inside the button.

elements.name: dap-ds-calendar
elements.description:
A calendar is a visual representation of dates. It allows users to select a date.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-change** - Fired when the calendar value changes.

### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the calendar.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-calendar-display** - The display property of the calendar container. Default is flex. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-isolation** - The isolation property of the calendar. Default is isolate. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-block-display** - The display property of the calendar block. Default is block. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-transition** - The transition property for the calendar. Default is 'all 0.2s ease-in-out'. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-header-display** - The display property of the calendar header. Default is grid. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-header-grid-flow** - The grid-auto-flow property of the calendar header. Default is column. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-header-width** - The width of the calendar header. Default is 100%. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-header-gap** - The gap between header items. Default is the design system's spacing-100. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-select-min-height** - The minimum height of the select trigger. Default is auto. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-select-max-height** - The maximum height of the select trigger. Default is 32px. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-select-padding** - The padding of the select trigger. Default is the design system's spacing-200. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-select-border-radius** - The border radius of the select trigger. Default is the design system's radius-rounded. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-select-border-color** - The border color of the select trigger. Default is the design system's border-neutral-transparent-interactive. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-select-background** - The background color of the select trigger. Default is the design system's button-subtle-background-enabled. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-select-color** - The text color of the select trigger. Default is the design system's button-subtle-text-enabled. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-select-font-size** - The font size of the select trigger. Default is the design system's font-sm. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-select-font-style** - The font style of the select trigger. Default is normal. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-select-font-weight** - The font weight of the select trigger. Default is the design system's font-weight-bold. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-nav-button-margin** - The margin of the navigation buttons. Default is the design system's spacing-200. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-calendar-nav-button-color** - The color of the navigation button icons. Default is the design system's button-subtle-icon-enabled. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main calendar container.
- **header** - The header of the calendar.
- **body** - The body of the calendar.

elements.name: dap-ds-callout
elements.description:
`dap-ds-callout` is a custom callout component.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-close** - Fired when the close button is clicked.

### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the callout.
- **title** - The title of the callout.
- **icon** - The icon of the callout.
- **actions** - The actions of the callout.
- **close** - The close button of the callout.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-callout-padding** - Padding of the callout content. Default: var(--dds-spacing-300) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-gap** - Gap between elements in horizontal layout. Default: var(--dds-spacing-300) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-icon-size** - Size of the icon. Default: var(--dds-spacing-600) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-title-color** - Color of the title text. Default: var(--dds-text-neutral-strong) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-description-color** - Color of the description text. Default: var(--dds-text-neutral-base) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-title-font-size** - Font size of the title. Default: var(--dds-font-base) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-description-font-size** - Font size of the description. Default: var(--dds-font-base) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-title-font-weight** - Font weight of the title. Default: var(--dds-font-weight-bold) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-description-font-weight** - Font weight of the description. Default: var(--dds-font-weight-medium) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-actions-font-weight** - Font weight of the actions. Default: var(--dds-font-weight-bold) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-actions-gap** - Gap between action items. Default: var(--dds-spacing-400) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-content-gap** - Gap between content elements. Default: var(--dds-spacing-100) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-border-radius** - Border radius of the callout. Default: var(--dds-radius-base) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-brand-background** - Brand variant background color. Default: var(--dds-background-brand-base) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-brand-background-subtle** - Brand variant subtle background color. Default: var(--dds-background-brand-subtle) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-brand-background-medium** - Brand variant medium background color. Default: var(--dds-background-brand-medium) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-brand-background-strong** - Brand variant strong background color. Default: var(--dds-background-brand-strong) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-brand-icon** - Brand variant icon color. Default: var(--dds-icon-brand-subtle) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-brand-border** - Brand variant border color. Default: var(--dds-border-brand-subtle) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-info-background** - Info variant background color. Default: var(--dds-background-informative-base) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-info-background-subtle** - Info variant subtle background color. Default: var(--dds-background-informative-subtle) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-info-background-medium** - Info variant medium background color. Default: var(--dds-background-informative-medium) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-info-background-strong** - Info variant strong background color. Default: var(--dds-background-informative-strong) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-info-icon** - Info variant icon color. Default: var(--dds-icon-informative-subtle) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-info-border** - Info variant border color. Default: var(--dds-border-informative-subtle) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-positive-background** - Positive variant background color. Default: var(--dds-background-positive-base) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-positive-background-subtle** - Positive variant subtle background color. Default: var(--dds-background-positive-subtle) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-positive-background-medium** - Positive variant medium background color. Default: var(--dds-background-positive-medium) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-positive-background-strong** - Positive variant strong background color. Default: var(--dds-background-positive-strong) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-positive-icon** - Positive variant icon color. Default: var(--dds-icon-positive-subtle) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-positive-border** - Positive variant border color. Default: var(--dds-border-positive-subtle) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-warning-background** - Warning variant background color. Default: var(--dds-background-warning-base) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-warning-background-subtle** - Warning variant subtle background color. Default: var(--dds-background-warning-subtle) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-warning-background-medium** - Warning variant medium background color. Default: var(--dds-background-warning-medium) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-warning-background-strong** - Warning variant strong background color. Default: var(--dds-background-warning-strong) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-warning-icon** - Warning variant icon color. Default: var(--dds-icon-neutral-strong) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-warning-border** - Warning variant border color. Default: var(--dds-border-warning-subtle) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-negative-background** - Negative variant background color. Default: var(--dds-background-negative-base) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-negative-background-subtle** - Negative variant subtle background color. Default: var(--dds-background-negative-subtle) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-negative-background-medium** - Negative variant medium background color. Default: var(--dds-background-negative-medium) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-negative-background-strong** - Negative variant strong background color. Default: var(--dds-background-negative-strong) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-negative-icon** - Negative variant icon color. Default: var(--dds-icon-negative-subtle) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-callout-negative-border** - Negative variant border color. Default: var(--dds-border-negative-subtle) _(default: undefined)_

elements.name: dap-ds-card-actions
elements.description:
A card actions is a container for actions in a card.
---


### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the card actions.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-card-actions-gap** - The gap between items in the card actions. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-200)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-actions-padding-lg** - The padding for large size card actions. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-600)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-actions-padding-md** - The padding for medium size card actions. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-400)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-actions-padding-sm** - The padding for small size card actions. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-400)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-actions-margin-lg** - The margin for large size card actions spacing. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-600)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-actions-margin-md** - The margin for medium size card actions spacing. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-400)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-actions-margin-sm** - The margin for small size card actions spacing. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-400)`. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main card actions container.

attributes.name: parentSized
attributes.description: Whether the card actions should be sized from the parent.

slots.description: The content of the card actions.

properties.name: parentSized
properties.description: Whether the card actions should be sized from the parent.

properties.name: spacing
properties.description: The spacing of the card actions. This adds a margin to the card actions. Default is `bottom`.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the card actions. Default is `sm`.

elements.name: dap-ds-card-content
elements.description:
A card content is a container for content in a card.
---


### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the card-content.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-card-content-padding** - The padding of the card content. Default is `0`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-content-margin** - The margin of the card content. Default is `0`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-content-font-size** - The font size of the card content. Default is `var(--dds-font-base)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-content-line-height** - The line height of the card content. Default is `var(--dds-font-line-height-xlarge)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-content-spacing-lg** - The large spacing value. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-600)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-content-spacing-md** - The medium spacing value. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-400)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-content-spacing-sm** - The small spacing value. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-400)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-content-spacing-top** - The top spacing value. Default is `0`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-content-spacing-bottom** - The bottom spacing value. Default is `0`. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main card content container.

attributes.name: renderAs
attributes.description: The base rendered root tag of the card content.

attributes.name: parentSized
attributes.description: Whether the card content should be sized from the parent.

slots.description: The content of the card-content.

properties.name: renderAs
properties.description: The base rendered root tag of the card content.

properties.name: parentSized
properties.description: Whether the card content should be sized from the parent.

properties.name: spacing
properties.description: The spacing of the card content. This adds a margin to the card subtitle. Default is `bottom`.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the card subtitle. Default is `sm`.

elements.name: dap-ds-card-image
elements.description:
A card image is a container for images in a card.
---


### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The default slot for the image. The slot can accept any element, for example a video. If nothing is added to the slot, the image will be rendered.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-card-image-width** - The width of the image. Default is `100%`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-image-height** - The height of the image. Default is `auto`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-image-object-fit** - How the image fits within its container. Default is `cover`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-image-background-position** - The background position of the image. Default is `center`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-image-background-size** - How the background image is sized. Default is `cover`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-image-background-repeat** - How the background image repeats. Default is `no-repeat`. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main card image container.

---


### **Slots:**

- **--dds-card-subtitle-font-size** - The font size of the subtitle. Default is `var(--dds-font-xs)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-subtitle-font-weight** - The font weight of the subtitle. Default is `var(--dds-font-weight-bold)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-subtitle-line-height** - The line height of the subtitle. Default is `var(--dds-font-line-height-large)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-subtitle-padding-sm** - The padding for small size. Default is `0 var(--dds-spacing-400)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-subtitle-padding-md** - The padding for medium size. Default is `0 var(--dds-spacing-400)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-subtitle-padding-lg** - The padding for large size. Default is `0 var(--dds-spacing-600)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-subtitle-margin-sm** - The base margin for small size. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-400)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-subtitle-margin-md** - The base margin for medium size. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-400)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-subtitle-margin-lg** - The base margin for large size. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-600)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-subtitle-spacing-top-sm** - The top spacing for small size. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-400)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-subtitle-spacing-top-md** - The top spacing for medium size. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-400)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-subtitle-spacing-top-lg** - The top spacing for large size. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-600)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-subtitle-spacing-bottom-sm** - The bottom spacing for small size. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-400)`. _(default: undefined)_

- **--dds-card-subtitle-spacing-bottom-lg** - The bottom spacing for large size. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-600)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-subtitle-spacing-both-sm** - The both (top and bottom) spacing for small size. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-400)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-subtitle-spacing-both-md** - The both (top and bottom) spacing for medium size. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-400)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-subtitle-spacing-both-lg** - The both (top and bottom) spacing for large size. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-600)`. _(default: undefined)_

elements.name: dap-ds-card
elements.description:
A card is a container for content, actions, and images in a consistent format.
---


### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the card.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-card-padding** - The padding of the card. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-400)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-border-radius** - The border radius of the card. Default is `var(--dds-radius-large)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-border-width** - The border width of the card. Default is `var(--dds-border-width-base)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-border-color** - The border color of the card. Default is `var(--dds-border-neutral-divider)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-background** - The background color of the card. Default is `var(--dds-background-neutral-base)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-hover-border-color** - The border color when hovering over the card. Default is `var(--dds-border-brand-base)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-active-border-color** - The border color when the card is active. Default is `var(--dds-border-brand-medium)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-shadow** - The box shadow of the card. Default is `none`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-hover-shadow** - The box shadow when hovering over the card. Default is `none`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-transition-duration** - The duration of the card's transitions. Default is `var(--dds-transition-medium)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-card-transition-timing** - The timing function of the card's transitions. Default is `var(--dds-easing-ease-in-out)`. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main card container.

elements.name: dap-ds-checkbox
elements.description:
A checkbox is a form element that allows the user to select one or more options from a set.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-change** - Fired when the checkbox is checked or unchecked.
- **dds-blur** - Emitted when the checkbox loses focus.
- **dds-focus** - Emitted when the checkbox gains focus.
- **dds-input** - Emitted when the checkbox receives input.

### **Methods:**
 - **focus(): _void_** - Programmatically focuses the checkbox input element.
- **blur(): _void_** - Programmatically blurs the checkbox input element.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-checkbox-size** - The size of the checkbox. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-500)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-border-width** - The border width of the checkbox. Default is `var(--dds-border-width-large)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-border-radius** - The border radius of the checkbox. Default is `var(--dds-radius-small)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-border-color** - The border color of the checkbox. Default is `var(--dds-border-neutral-base)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-background-color** - The background color of the checkbox. Default is `transparent`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-icon-color** - The color of the checkbox icon. Default is `var(--dds-button-primary-icon-enabled)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-hover-border-color** - The border color when hovering over the checkbox. Default is `var(--dds-border-neutral-medium)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-hover-background-color** - The background color when hovering over the checkbox. Default is `var(--dds-background-neutral-medium)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-active-border-color** - The border color when the checkbox is active. Default is `var(--dds-border-neutral-strong)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-active-background-color** - The background color when the checkbox is active. Default is `var(--dds-background-neutral-strong)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-checked-border-color** - The border color when the checkbox is checked. Default is `var(--dds-background-brand-base-inverted)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-checked-background-color** - The background color when the checkbox is checked. Default is `var(--dds-background-brand-base-inverted)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-checked-hover-border-color** - The border color when hovering over a checked checkbox. Default is `var(--dds-background-brand-medium-inverted)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-checked-hover-background-color** - The background color when hovering over a checked checkbox. Default is `var(--dds-background-brand-medium-inverted)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-checked-active-border-color** - The border color when a checked checkbox is active. Default is `var(--dds-background-brand-strong-inverted)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-checked-active-background-color** - The background color when a checked checkbox is active. Default is `var(--dds-background-brand-strong-inverted)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-invalid-border-color** - The border color when the checkbox is invalid. Default is `var(--dds-border-negative-base)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-invalid-background-color** - The background color when the checkbox is invalid. Default is `var(--dds-background-negative-base)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-invalid-hover-border-color** - The border color when hovering over an invalid checkbox. Default is `var(--dds-border-negative-medium)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-invalid-hover-background-color** - The background color when hovering over an invalid checkbox. Default is `var(--dds-background-negative-medium)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-invalid-active-border-color** - The border color when an invalid checkbox is active. Default is `var(--dds-border-negative-strong)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-invalid-active-background-color** - The background color when an invalid checkbox is active. Default is `var(--dds-background-negative-strong)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-disabled-border-color** - The border color when the checkbox is disabled. Default is `var(--dds-button-primary-background-disabled)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-disabled-background-color** - The background color when the checkbox is disabled. Default is `var(--dds-button-primary-background-disabled)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-disabled-icon-color** - The color of the checkbox icon when disabled. Default is `var(--dds-button-primary-icon-disabled)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-readonly-border-color** - The border color when the checkbox is readonly. Default is `var(--dds-border-neutral-subtle)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-readonly-background-color** - The background color when the checkbox is readonly. Default is `var(--dds-background-neutral-subtle)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-checkbox-readonly-icon-color** - The color of the checkbox icon when readonly. Default is `var(--dds-text-neutral-base)`. _(default: undefined)_

- **icon** - The icon of the checkbox.
- **label-container** - The label container of the checkbox.
- **description** - The description of the checkbox.
- **readonly** - The readonly state of the checkbox.

elements.name: dap-ds-combobox
elements.description:
A select is a form element that allows the user to select one option from a set.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-change** - Fired when the select value changes.
- **dds-blur** - Emitted when the select loses focus.
- **dds-focus** - Emitted when the select gains focus.
- **dds-clear** - Emitted when the select is cleared.
- **dds-search** - Emitted when the manual input value changes.
- **dds-input** - Emitted when typing happens in the input.

### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The default slot for the options.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-combobox-background** - The background color of the combobox. Defaults to var(--dds-fields-background-default). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-border-color** - The border color of the combobox. Defaults to var(--dds-border-neutral-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-border-width** - The border width of the combobox. Defaults to var(--dds-border-width-base, 1px). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-border-radius** - The border radius of the combobox. Defaults to var(--dds-radius-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-text-color** - The text color of the combobox. Defaults to var(--dds-text-neutral-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-placeholder-color** - The placeholder text color. Defaults to var(--dds-text-neutral-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-disabled-background** - The background color when disabled. Defaults to var(--dds-background-neutral-stronger). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-disabled-text** - The text color when disabled. Defaults to var(--dds-text-neutral-disabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-error-border** - The border color for error state. Defaults to var(--dds-border-negative-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-success-border** - The border color for success state. Defaults to var(--dds-border-positive-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-icon-color** - The color of the icons. Defaults to var(--dds-text-icon-neutral-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-clear-icon-color** - The color of the clear icon. Defaults to var(--dds-button-subtle-icon-neutral-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-popup-background** - The background color of the popup. Defaults to var(--dds-background-neutral-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-popup-shadow** - The box shadow of the popup. Defaults to 0 4px 6px -1px rgb(0 0 0 / 8%), 0 2px 4px -1px rgb(0 0 0 / 6%). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-padding-xs** - The padding for extra small size. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-padding-sm** - The padding for small size. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-padding-lg** - The padding for large size. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-padding-horizontal** - The horizontal padding. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-padding-vertical** - The vertical padding. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-gap** - The gap between elements. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-100). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-icon-gap** - The gap between icons. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-action-gap** - The gap between action elements. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-action-padding** - The padding for action elements. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-clear-icon-width** - The width of the clear icon. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-800). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-dropdown-icon-right** - The right position of the dropdown icon. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-600). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-min-width** - The minimum width of the combobox. Defaults to 7.5rem. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main select container.
- **trigger** - The trigger button of the select.
- **label** - The label of the select.
- **description** - The description of the select.
- **feedback** - The feedback of the select.
- **tooltip** - The tooltip of the select.
- **option-list** - The option list of the select.

elements.name: dap-ds-copybox-input
elements.description:
A copybox input is a field for copying an input value.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-copy** - Fired when the user clicks on the copy button.
- **dds-change** - Fired when the input value changes.
- **dds-input** - Fired when the input value changes.
- **dds-keydown** - Fired when a key is pressed down.
- **dds-blur** - Fired when the input loses focus.
- **dds-focus** - Emitted when the input gains focus.
- **dds-not-allowed** - Emitted when the value cannot be copied.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-input-height** - The height of the input. Default is var(--dds-spacing-1000). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-padding** - The padding of the input. Default is var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-font-size** - The font size of the input. Default is var(--dds-font-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-border-color** - The border color of the input. Default is var(--dds-border-neutral-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-background-color** - The background color of the input. Default is var(--dds-fields-background-default). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-text-color** - The text color of the input. Default is var(--dds-text-neutral-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-border-radius** - The border radius of the input. Default is var(--dds-radius-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-border-width** - The border width of the input. Default is var(--dds-border-width-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-disabled-background** - The background color of the disabled input. Default is var(--dds-fields-background-disabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-disabled-text** - The text color of the disabled input. Default is var(--dds-text-neutral-disabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-readonly-background** - The background color of the readonly input. Default is var(--dds-fields-background-read-only). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-readonly-text** - The text color of the readonly input. Default is var(--dds-text-neutral-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-success-border** - The border color of the success input. Default is var(--dds-border-positive-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-error-border** - The border color of the error input. Default is var(--dds-border-negative-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-addon-background** - The background color of the input addon. Default is var(--dds-background-ui-neutral-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-addon-success-background** - The background color of the success input addon. Default is var(--dds-background-ui-positive-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-addon-error-background** - The background color of the error input addon. Default is var(--dds-background-ui-negative-enabled). _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The base container of the component.
- **postfix** - The inner postfix icon part of the component.
- **button** - The button of the component.

elements.name: dap-ds-dap-badge
elements.description:
A DP badge is a brand element showing the use of this system design library.
---


### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - Description of badge *

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-badge-padding-sm** - Custom padding for the small badge (default: var(--dds-spacing-200) var(--dds-spacing-300)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-padding-lg** - Custom padding for the large badge (default: var(--dds-spacing-400)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-border-width** - Custom border width for the badge (default: var(--dds-border-width-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-border-color** - Custom border color for the badge (default: var(--dds-border-neutral-divider)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-border-radius** - Custom border radius for the badge (default: var(--dds-radius-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-color** - Custom text color for the badge (default: var(--dds-text-neutral-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-gap** - Custom gap between icon and text (default: var(--dds-spacing-200)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-font-size-sm** - Custom font size for the small badge (default: var(--dds-font-xs)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-font-size-lg** - Custom font size for the large badge (default: var(--dds-font-xs)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-font-weight** - Custom font weight for the badge (default: var(--dds-font-weight-medium)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-line-height** - Custom line height for the badge (default: var(--dds-font-line-height-large)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-border-color-normal** - Custom border color for the normal variant (default: var(--dds-transparent-black-medium)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-background-color-normal** - Custom background color for the normal variant (default: var(--dds-background-brand-subtle)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-color-normal** - Custom text color for the normal variant (default: var(--dds-text-brand-subtle)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-border-color-inverted** - Custom border color for the inverted variant (default: var(--dds-transparent-white-medium)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-background-color-inverted** - Custom background color for the inverted variant (default: var(--dds-background-brand-base-inverted)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-badge-color-inverted** - Custom text color for the inverted variant (default: var(--dds-text-neutral-inverted)) _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - Main badge container
- **icon** - Badge icon
- **text** - Badge text

elements.name: dap-ds-datatable
elements.description:
A data table is a component that displays data in a tabular format.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-sorting-change** - Fired when the sorting of the table changes.
- **dds-selection-change** - Fired when the selection of the table changes.
- **dds-pagination-change** - Fired when the pagination of the table changes.
- **dds-row-click** - Fired when a row is clicked.

### **Slots:**
 - **loading** - The loading content of the table.
- **empty** - The empty content of the table.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-datatable-bg-color** - Background color of the table _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-border-color** - Border color of the table cells _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-header-bg-color** - Background color of the table header _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-header-text-color** - Text color of the table header _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-row-hover-bg-color** - Background color of hovered rows _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-row-selected-bg-color** - Background color of selected rows _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-cell-padding** - Padding of table cells _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-header-padding** - Padding of header cells _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-border-width** - Width of table borders _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-font-size** - Font size of the table _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-line-height** - Line height of the table _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-header-font-weight** - Font weight of the header _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-stripe-color** - Background color for striped rows _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-stripe-enabled** - Whether to enable striped rows _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-border-radius** - Border radius of the table _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-shadow** - Box shadow of the table _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-transition-duration** - Duration of hover/selection transitions _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-z-index** - Z-index of the table _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-min-height** - Minimum height of the table _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-max-height** - Maximum height of the table _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-overflow-x** - Horizontal overflow behavior _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-datatable-overflow-y** - Vertical overflow behavior _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main table container.
- **header** - The header of the table.
- **header-row** - The header row of the table.
- **header-cell** - All cells of the header.
- **body** - The body of the table.
- **row** - All rows of the table.
- **cell** - All cells of the table.
- **pager** - The pager of the table.

attributes.name: manualPagination
attributes.description: Enables manual pagination. If this option is set to true, the table will not automatically paginate rows and instead will expect you to manually paginate the rows before passing them to the table. This is useful if you are doing server-side pagination and aggregation.

attributes.name: autoResetPageIndex
attributes.description: If set to true, pagination will be reset to the first page when page-altering state changes eg. data is updated, filters change, grouping changes, etc. This behavior is automatically disabled when manualPagination is true but it can be overridden by explicitly assigning a boolean value to the autoResetPageIndex table option.

elements.name: dap-ds-datepicker
elements.description:
A datepicker is a graphical user interface widget that allows the user to select a date from a calendar and/or time from a time range.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-change** - Fired when the datepicker value changes.
- **dds-input** - Fired when the datepicker input value changes.
- **dds-valid-date** - Fired when the datepicker input value is valid. Happens on manual input typing.
- **dds-invalid-date** - Fired when the datepicker input value is invalid. Happens on manual input typing.
- **dds-clear** - Fired when the datepicker is cleared.
- **dds-focus** - Emitted when the datepicker gains focus.
- **dds-blur** - Emitted when the datepicker loses focus.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-combobox-background** - The background color of the combobox. Defaults to var(--dds-fields-background-default). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-border-color** - The border color of the combobox. Defaults to var(--dds-border-neutral-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-border-width** - The border width of the combobox. Defaults to var(--dds-border-width-base, 1px). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-border-radius** - The border radius of the combobox. Defaults to var(--dds-radius-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-text-color** - The text color of the combobox. Defaults to var(--dds-text-neutral-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-placeholder-color** - The placeholder text color. Defaults to var(--dds-text-neutral-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-disabled-background** - The background color when disabled. Defaults to var(--dds-background-neutral-stronger). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-disabled-text** - The text color when disabled. Defaults to var(--dds-text-neutral-disabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-error-border** - The border color for error state. Defaults to var(--dds-border-negative-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-success-border** - The border color for success state. Defaults to var(--dds-border-positive-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-icon-color** - The color of the icons. Defaults to var(--dds-text-icon-neutral-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-clear-icon-color** - The color of the clear icon. Defaults to var(--dds-button-subtle-icon-neutral-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-popup-background** - The background color of the popup. Defaults to var(--dds-background-neutral-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-popup-shadow** - The box shadow of the popup. Defaults to 0 4px 6px -1px rgb(0 0 0 / 8%), 0 2px 4px -1px rgb(0 0 0 / 6%). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-padding-xs** - The padding for extra small size. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-padding-sm** - The padding for small size. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-padding-lg** - The padding for large size. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-padding-horizontal** - The horizontal padding. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-padding-vertical** - The vertical padding. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-gap** - The gap between elements. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-100). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-icon-gap** - The gap between icons. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-action-gap** - The gap between action elements. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-action-padding** - The padding for action elements. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-clear-icon-width** - The width of the clear icon. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-800). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-dropdown-icon-right** - The right position of the dropdown icon. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-600). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-min-width** - The minimum width of the combobox. Defaults to 7.5rem. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main datepicker container.
- **calendar** - The calendar of the datepicker.
- **trigger** - The trigger button of the datepicker.
- **label** - The label of the datepicker.
- **description** - The description of the datepicker.
- **feedback** - The feedback of the datepicker.
- **tooltip** - The tooltip of the datepicker.
- **input** - The input of the datepicker.
- **clear-button** - The clear button of the datepicker.

elements.name: dap-ds-divider
elements.description:
A divider is a visual separator between elements.
---


### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-divider-border-width** - The width of the divider border. Defaults to var(--dds-border-width-base) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-divider-border-style** - The style of the divider border. Defaults to solid _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-divider-border-color** - The color of the divider border. Defaults to var(--dds-border-neutral-divider) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-divider-border-color-inverted** - The color of the divider border when inverted. Defaults to var(--dds-border-neutral-divider-inverted) _(default: undefined)_

elements.name: dap-ds-feedback
elements.description:
A feedback is a container for feedback messages.
---


### **Slots:**
 - **icon** - The custom icon of the feedback.
- _default_ - The text of the feedback.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-feedback-spacing** - The spacing around the feedback component. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-200)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-feedback-color** - The text color of the feedback. Default is `var(--dds-text-positive-subtle)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-feedback-font-size** - The font size of the feedback. Default is `var(--dds-font-sm)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-feedback-font-weight** - The font weight of the feedback. Default is `var(--dds-font-weight-bold)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-feedback-icon-fill** - The fill color of the feedback icon. Default is `var(--dds-icon-positive-subtle)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-feedback-icon-spacing** - The spacing between the icon and text. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-100)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-feedback-color-warning** - The text color for warning feedback. Default is `var(--dds-text-neutral-base)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-feedback-color-positive** - The text color for positive feedback. Default is `var(--dds-text-positive-subtle)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-feedback-color-negative** - The text color for negative feedback. Default is `var(--dds-text-negative-subtle)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-feedback-icon-fill-warning** - The icon fill color for warning feedback. Default is `var(--dds-icon-informative-subtle)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-feedback-icon-fill-positive** - The icon fill color for positive feedback. Default is `var(--dds-icon-positive-subtle)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-feedback-icon-fill-negative** - The icon fill color for negative feedback. Default is `var(--dds-icon-negative-subtle)`. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main feedback container.
- **icon** - The icon of the feedback.
- **text** - The text of the feedback.
