elements.name: dap-ds-file-input-list-item
elements.description:
A file input list item is a container for file input list items.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-file-remove** - Dispatched when a file is removed from the list.

### **Slots:**
 - **delete-button** - The delete button.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-file-list-item-padding** - The padding of the file list item. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-file-list-item-border-width** - The border width of the file list item. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-file-list-item-border-color** - The border color of the file list item. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-file-list-item-border-radius** - The border radius of the file list item. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-file-list-item-bg-color** - The background color of the file list item. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-file-list-item-font-weight** - The font weight of the file list item. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-file-list-item-disabled-bg-color** - The background color of the disabled file list item. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-file-list-item-disabled-color** - The text color of the disabled file list item. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-file-list-item-content-margin** - The margin of the content within the file list item. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-file-list-item-content-gap** - The gap between content elements in the file list item. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-file-list-item-filename-color** - The color of the filename text. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-file-list-item-filesize-color** - The color of the filesize text. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-file-list-item-feedback-padding** - The padding of the feedback section. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-file-list-item-feedback-border-color** - The border color of the feedback section. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-file-list-item-feedback-font-size** - The font size of the feedback text. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main file input list item container.
- **feedback** - The feedback container.
- **link** - The link text of the item component.
- **filename** - The filename text of the item component.
- **filesize** - The filesize text of the item component.
- **spinner** - The spinner of the item component.
- **remove-button** - The remove button of the item component.
- **thumbnail** - The thumbnail of the item component.

elements.name: dap-ds-file-input
elements.description:
A file input is a control that allows users to select files to upload.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-upload-start** - Fired when a file upload starts.
- **dds-upload-progress** - Fired during file upload progress.
- **dds-upload-complete** - Fired when a file upload completes successfully.
- **dds-upload-error** - Fired when a file upload encounters an error. Can contain a single error or an array of validation errors.
- **dds-all-uploads-complete** - Fired when all file uploads are complete.
- **dds-file-removed** - Fired when a file is removed from the file input.
- **dds-file-delete-error** - Fired when a file deletion from server encounters an error.
- **dds-file-change** - Fired when the file input value changes.

### **Methods:**
 - **abortUpload(fileName: _string_)** - Aborts upload for a specific file
- **abortAllUploads()** - Aborts all active uploads
- **startUpload()** - Manually start upload of all selected files

### **Slots:**
 - **dropzone-content** - The content to display in the dropzone.

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main file input container.
- **input** - The file input control.
- **label** - The file input label.
- **description** - The file input description.
- **feedback** - The file input feedback.
- **tooltip** - The file input tooltip.
- **upload-progress** - The upload progress container.
- **browse-button** - The browse button.
- **upload-button** - The upload button.
- **dropzone** - The dropzone area.
- **file-list** - The file list container.
- **file-list-item** - Individual file list items.

elements.name: dap-ds-icon
elements.description:
An icon is a graphical symbol that represents an object or action.
---


### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the icon for custom svg icons.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-icon-size-xs** - The size of extra small icons (default: 12px) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-size-sm** - The size of small icons (default: 16px) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-size-md** - The size of medium icons (default: 20px) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-size-lg** - The size of large icons (default: 24px) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-size-xl** - The size of extra large icons (default: 32px) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-size-xxl** - The size of extra extra large icons (default: 40px) _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main icon container.
- **icon** - The icon of the icon.

attributes.description: The size of the icon

attributes.description: Whether the icon is focusable. Default is false.

elements.name: dap-ds-icon-button
elements.description:
An icon button is a button with an icon.
---


### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The icon of the button.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-icon-button-border-width** - The width of the button's border. Defaults to var(--dds-border-width-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-border-color** - The color of the button's border. Defaults to var(--dds-border-neutral-transparent-interactive). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-border-radius** - The border radius of the button. Defaults to var(--dds-radius-rounded). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-hover-border-width** - The width of the button's border on hover. Defaults to var(--dds-border-width-large). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-active-border-width** - The width of the button's border when active. Defaults to var(--dds-border-width-xlarge). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-transition** - The transition property for the button. Defaults to var(--dds-transition-all). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-cursor** - The cursor style for the button. Defaults to pointer. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-disabled-cursor** - The cursor style for the disabled button. Defaults to not-allowed. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-column-gap** - The gap between icon and text. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-100). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-padding-lg** - Padding for large size. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-0). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-padding-md** - Padding for medium size. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-100). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-padding-sm** - Padding for small size. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-50). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-padding-xs** - Padding for extra small size. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-25). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-size-lg** - Size for large button. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-800). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-size-md** - Size for medium button. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-600). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-size-sm** - Size for small button. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-400). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-size-xs** - Size for extra small button. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-neutral-bg** - Background color for neutral variant. Defaults to var(--dds-transparent-black-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-neutral-color** - Text color for neutral variant. Defaults to var(--dds-icon-neutral-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-neutral-hover-bg** - Hover background color for neutral variant. Defaults to var(--dds-transparent-black-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-neutral-active-bg** - Active background color for neutral variant. Defaults to var(--dds-transparent-black-medium). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-brand-bg** - Background color for brand variant. Defaults to var(--dds-button-subtle-background-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-brand-color** - Text color for brand variant. Defaults to var(--dds-button-subtle-icon-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-brand-hover-bg** - Hover background color for brand variant. Defaults to var(--dds-button-subtle-background-hover). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-brand-active-bg** - Active background color for brand variant. Defaults to var(--dds-button-subtle-background-pressed). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-inverted-bg** - Background color for inverted variant. Defaults to var(--dds-transparent-white-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-inverted-color** - Text color for inverted variant. Defaults to var(--dds-button-primary-icon-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-inverted-hover-bg** - Hover background color for inverted variant. Defaults to var(--dds-transparent-white-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-inverted-active-bg** - Active background color for inverted variant. Defaults to var(--dds-transparent-white-medium). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-inverted-brand-bg** - Background color for inverted brand variant. Defaults to var(--dds-button-primary-background-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-inverted-brand-color** - Text color for inverted brand variant. Defaults to var(--dds-button-primary-icon-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-inverted-brand-hover-bg** - Hover background color for inverted brand variant. Defaults to var(--dds-button-primary-background-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-inverted-brand-active-bg** - Active background color for inverted brand variant. Defaults to var(--dds-button-primary-background-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-icon-button-disabled-color** - Color for disabled state. Defaults to var(--dds-icon-neutral-disabled). _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main button container.
- **content** - The icon of the button.

elements.name: dap-ds-input
elements.description:
An input is a field used to collect user input.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-change** - Fired when the input value changes.
- **dds-input** - Fired when the input value changes.
- **dds-keydown** - Fired when a key is pressed down.
- **dds-blur** - Fired when the input loses focus.
- **dds-focus** - Emitted when the input gains focus.

### **Slots:**
 - **postfix** - The postfix of the input.
- **prefix** - The prefix of the input.
- **addon-before** - The addon before the input.
- **addon-after** - The addon after the input.
- **feedback-icon** - The custom icon of the feedback.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-input-height** - The height of the input. Default is var(--dds-spacing-1000). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-padding** - The padding of the input. Default is var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-font-size** - The font size of the input. Default is var(--dds-font-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-border-color** - The border color of the input. Default is var(--dds-border-neutral-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-background-color** - The background color of the input. Default is var(--dds-fields-background-default). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-text-color** - The text color of the input. Default is var(--dds-text-neutral-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-border-radius** - The border radius of the input. Default is var(--dds-radius-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-border-width** - The border width of the input. Default is var(--dds-border-width-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-disabled-background** - The background color of the disabled input. Default is var(--dds-fields-background-disabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-disabled-text** - The text color of the disabled input. Default is var(--dds-text-neutral-disabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-readonly-background** - The background color of the readonly input. Default is var(--dds-fields-background-read-only). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-readonly-text** - The text color of the readonly input. Default is var(--dds-text-neutral-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-success-border** - The border color of the success input. Default is var(--dds-border-positive-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-error-border** - The border color of the error input. Default is var(--dds-border-negative-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-addon-background** - The background color of the input addon. Default is var(--dds-background-ui-neutral-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-addon-success-background** - The background color of the success input addon. Default is var(--dds-background-ui-positive-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-addon-error-background** - The background color of the error input addon. Default is var(--dds-background-ui-negative-enabled). _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main input container.
- **input** - The input element.
- **label** - The label of the input.
- **description** - The description of the input.
- **feedback** - The feedback of the input.
- **tooltip** - The tooltip of the input.
- **addon-before** - The addon before the input.
- **addon-after** - The addon after the input.
- **prefix** - The prefix of the input.
- **postfix** - The postfix of the input.

elements.name: dap-ds-label
elements.description:
A label is a container for labels intended for general use. It contains a label text, description, and tooltip.
---


### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-label-background** - The background color of the label container. Default is `var(--dds-background-neutral-subtle)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-label-border-color** - The border color of the label container. Default is `var(--dds-border-neutral-subtle)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-label-border-width** - The border width of the label container. Default is `var(--dds-border-width-base)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-label-border-radius** - The border radius of the label container. Default is `var(--dds-radius-base)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-label-padding** - The padding of the label container. Default is `var(--dds-spacing-400)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-label-disabled-background** - The background color of the label container when disabled. Default is `var(--dds-background-neutral-disabled-inverted)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-label-checked-border-color** - The border color of the label container when checked. Default is `var(--dds-background-brand-base-inverted)`. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main label container.
- **label** - Tha main label container. dap-ds-form-label element.
- **label-base** - The label text.
- **label-required** - The required indicator of the label.
- **label-optional** - The optional indicator of the label.
- **tooltip** - The tooltip of the label. dap-ds-tooltip element.
- **description** - The description of the label.

elements.name: dap-ds-link
elements.description:
A link is a reference to a web resource.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-click** - Emitted when the link is clicked.

### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The text of the link.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-link-color** - The color of the link text _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-hover-color** - The color of the link text on hover _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-active-color** - The color of the link text when active _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-visited-color** - The color of the visited link text _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-font-size** - The font size of the link text _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-line-height** - The line height of the link text _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-font-weight** - The font weight of the link text _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-text-decoration** - The text decoration of the link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-neutral-color** - The color of the neutral variant link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-neutral-hover-color** - The hover color of the neutral variant link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-neutral-active-color** - The active color of the neutral variant link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-neutral-visited-color** - The visited color of the neutral variant link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-brand-color** - The color of the brand variant link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-brand-hover-color** - The hover color of the brand variant link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-brand-active-color** - The active color of the brand variant link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-brand-visited-color** - The visited color of the brand variant link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-inverted-color** - The color of the inverted variant link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-inverted-hover-color** - The hover color of the inverted variant link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-inverted-active-color** - The active color of the inverted variant link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-inverted-visited-color** - The visited color of the inverted variant link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-warning-color** - The color of the warning variant link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-warning-hover-color** - The hover color of the warning variant link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-warning-active-color** - The active color of the warning variant link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-warning-visited-color** - The visited color of the warning variant link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-disabled-color** - The color of the disabled link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-disabled-hover-color** - The hover color of the disabled link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-disabled-active-color** - The active color of the disabled link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-disabled-visited-color** - The visited color of the disabled link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-lg-font-size** - The font size of the large link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-lg-line-height** - The line height of the large link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-md-font-size** - The font size of the medium link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-md-line-height** - The line height of the medium link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-sm-font-size** - The font size of the small link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-sm-line-height** - The line height of the small link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-xs-font-size** - The font size of the extra small link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-xs-line-height** - The line height of the extra small link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-normal-font-weight** - The font weight of the normal link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-bold-font-weight** - The font weight of the bold link _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-link-no-underline-text-decoration** - The text decoration when underline is removed _(default: undefined)_

elements.name: dap-ds-list-item
elements.description:
A list
---


### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the list item.
- **icon** - The icon of the list item.
- **title** - The title of the list item.
- **actions** - The actions of the list item.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-list-item-gap** - Gap between list item elements (default: var(--dds-spacing-200)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-list-item-content-gap** - Gap between content elements (default: var(--dds-spacing-200)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-list-item-horizontal-gap** - Gap for horizontal alignment (default: var(--dds-spacing-300)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-list-item-vertical-gap** - Gap for vertical alignment (default: var(--dds-spacing-200)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-list-item-icon-size** - Size of the icon (default: var(--dds-spacing-600)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-list-item-number-size** - Size of the number icon (default: 20px) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-list-item-actions-gap** - Gap between action elements (default: var(--dds-spacing-400)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-list-item-actions-padding** - Padding for the actions container (default: var(--dds-spacing-100)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-list-item-background-base** - Background color for base shade (default: var(--dds-background-neutral-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-list-item-background-subtle** - Background color for subtle shade (default: var(--dds-background-neutral-subtle)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-list-item-background-medium** - Background color for medium shade (default: var(--dds-background-neutral-medium)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-list-item-background-strong** - Background color for strong shade (default: var(--dds-background-neutral-strong)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-list-item-icon-brand** - Color for brand icon (default: var(--dds-icon-brand-subtle)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-list-item-icon-neutral** - Color for neutral icon (default: var(--dds-icon-neutral-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-list-item-icon-positive** - Color for positive icon (default: var(--dds-icon-positive-subtle)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-list-item-icon-negative** - Color for negative icon (default: var(--dds-icon-negative-subtle)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-list-item-title-color** - Title text color (default: var(--dds-text-neutral-strong)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-list-item-description-color** - Description text color (default: var(--dds-text-neutral-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-list-item-number-text-color** - Number text color (default: var(--dds-text-neutral-inverted)) _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main list item container.
- **icon** - The icon of the list item.
- **title** - The title of the list item.
- **description** - The description of the list item.
- **container** - The container of the list item.
- **list-item-base** - The base list item container.
- **icon-container** - The container of the icon.
- **title-container** - The container of the title.
- **description-container** - The container of the description.
- **actions-container** - The container of the actions.
- **iteractive-indicator-container** - The container of the interactive indicator.

elements.name: dap-ds-modal
elements.description:
A modal is a container for modal content.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-before-open** - Fires before the modal opens.
- **dds-opened** - Fires after the modal opens.
- **dds-before-close** - Fires before the modal closes.
- **dds-closed** - Fires after the modal closed.
- **dds-close** - Fires when the modal is closes. You can prevent the modal from closing by calling `event.preventDefault()`.
- **dds-ok** - Fires when the OK button is clicked. You can prevent the modal from closing by calling `event.preventDefault()`.
- **dds-cancel** - Fires when the Cancel button is clicked. You can prevent the modal from closing by calling `event.preventDefault()`.

### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the modal.
- **title** - The title of the modal.
- **description** - The description of the modal.
- **footer** - The footer of the modal.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-modal-max-block-size** - Maximum height of the modal. Default: 80vh. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-max-inline-size** - Maximum width of the modal. Default: 600px. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-padding** - Padding inside the modal. Default: var(--dds-spacing-800). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-transform-amount** - Amount to transform for entrance animation. Default: 2rem. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-transition-speed** - Speed of transition animations. Default: var(--dds-transition-fast). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-transition-timing** - Timing function for transitions. Default: var(--dds-easing-ease-in-out). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-border-width** - Border width of the modal. Default: var(--dds-border-width-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-border-color** - Border color of the modal. Default: var(--dds-border-neutral-divider). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-border-radius** - Border radius of the modal. Default: var(--dds-radius-large, 16px). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-background** - Background color of the modal. Default: var(--dds-background-neutral-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-header-margin** - Margin below the header. Default: var(--dds-spacing-800). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-footer-margin** - Margin above the footer. Default: var(--dds-spacing-400). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-footer-gap** - Gap between footer elements. Default: var(--dds-spacing-400). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-close-margin** - Margin for the close button. Default: var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main modal container.
- **panel** - The panel of the modal.
- **header** - The header of the modal.
- **title** - The title of the modal.
- **description** - The description of the modal.
- **footer** - The footer of the modal.
- **content** - The body of the modal.
- **closebutton** - The close button of the modal.

elements.name: dap-ds-navigation-menu-item
elements.description:
A navigation menu item that can contain either a simple link or dropdown content.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-navigation-item-click** - Fired when a navigation item is clicked.
- **dds-navigation-dropdown-open** - Fired when a navigation dropdown is opened.
- **dds-opened** - Fired when the popup is opened.
- **dds-closed** - Fired when the popup is closed.
- **dds-close** - Fired when the popup should be closed.

### **Slots:**
 - **trigger** - The trigger element (link, button, etc.) for this navigation item.
- **title** - The title of the navigation item.
- _default_ - The dropdown content (only used if trigger slot is provided).

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-popup-z-index** - Z-index of the popup. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-popup-padding** - Default padding of the popup. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-popup-padding-xs** - Padding of the popup when size is xs. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-popup-padding-lg** - Padding of the popup when size is lg. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-popup-border-width** - Border width of the popup. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-popup-border-radius** - Border radius of the popup. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-popup-border-color** - Border color of the popup. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-popup-background** - Background color of the popup. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-popup-color** - Text color of the popup. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-popup-arrow-size** - Size of the popup arrow. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The base part of the navigation item.
- **trigger** - The trigger element part.
- **content** - The dropdown content part.
- **popup** - The main popup container.
- **arrow** - The arrow of the popup.

attributes.name: exactHref
attributes.description: Whether the navigation item should be active if the href is exactly the same as the activeHref.

elements.name: dap-ds-notification-badge
elements.description:
A notification badge component is a user interface element that visually indicates the presence of new information or updates, often displaying a numeric count of unread notifications, messages, or items requiring attention.
---


### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the notification badge.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-notification-badge-size** - Controls the overall size of the notification badge _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-notification-badge-min-width** - Minimum width of the notification badge _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-notification-badge-height** - Height of the notification badge _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-notification-badge-padding** - Padding inside the notification badge _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-notification-badge-border-radius** - Border radius of the notification badge _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-notification-badge-font-size** - Font size of the notification badge text _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-notification-badge-dot-size** - Size of the dot variant _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-notification-badge-color** - Text color of the notification badge _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-notification-badge-neutral-bg** - Background color for neutral type _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-notification-badge-brand-bg** - Background color for brand type _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-notification-badge-info-bg** - Background color for info type _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-notification-badge-positive-bg** - Background color for positive type _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-notification-badge-warning-bg** - Background color for warning type _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-notification-badge-negative-bg** - Background color for negative type _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-notification-badge-circular-offset-x** - Horizontal offset for circular positioning _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-notification-badge-circular-offset-y** - Vertical offset for circular positioning _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main container of the notification badge.
- **noty** - The notification badge container.

attributes.name: badgeContent
attributes.description: The content of the badge, it can be a number or a string. Content tried to be parsed as a number, if it's not a number, it will be displayed as a string.

attributes.name: visible
attributes.description: This switch decides the visibility of the badge. This property overrides the badge content visibility. Use it for explicit control.

attributes.name: showZero
attributes.description: This switch decides whether to show a zero value or not.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The color scheme of the badge

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: The variant of the badge.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: The cap value of badge content, if the badge content is greater than the max value, it will be displayed as `[number]+`. Zero means no cap.

attributes.name: placement
attributes.description: The position of the badge content around the slot content.

attributes.name: circular-auto
attributes.description: Whether to automatically detect circular elements and adjust positioning accordingly

attributes.name: force-circular
attributes.description: Override circular positioning detection - forces circular positioning calculation

elements.name: dap-ds-number-input
elements.description:
A number input component.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-change** - Fired when the input value changes.
- **dds-input** - Fired when the input value changes.
- **dds-keydown** - Fired when a key is pressed down.
- **dds-blur** - Fired when the input loses focus.
- **dds-focus** - Emitted when the input gains focus.

### **Slots:**
 - **feedback-icon** - The custom icon of the feedback.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-input-height** - The height of the input. Default is var(--dds-spacing-1000). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-padding** - The padding of the input. Default is var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-font-size** - The font size of the input. Default is var(--dds-font-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-border-color** - The border color of the input. Default is var(--dds-border-neutral-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-background-color** - The background color of the input. Default is var(--dds-fields-background-default). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-text-color** - The text color of the input. Default is var(--dds-text-neutral-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-border-radius** - The border radius of the input. Default is var(--dds-radius-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-border-width** - The border width of the input. Default is var(--dds-border-width-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-disabled-background** - The background color of the disabled input. Default is var(--dds-fields-background-disabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-disabled-text** - The text color of the disabled input. Default is var(--dds-text-neutral-disabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-readonly-background** - The background color of the readonly input. Default is var(--dds-fields-background-read-only). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-readonly-text** - The text color of the readonly input. Default is var(--dds-text-neutral-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-success-border** - The border color of the success input. Default is var(--dds-border-positive-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-error-border** - The border color of the error input. Default is var(--dds-border-negative-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-addon-background** - The background color of the input addon. Default is var(--dds-background-ui-neutral-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-addon-success-background** - The background color of the success input addon. Default is var(--dds-background-ui-positive-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-addon-error-background** - The background color of the error input addon. Default is var(--dds-background-ui-negative-enabled). _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **postfix** - The postfix of the input.
- **decrement** - The decrement button of the input.
- **increment** - The increment button of the input.

An official website banner is a banner that displays that the website is an official website.

- **--dds-pager-button-border-radius** - The border radius of the pager buttons. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-pager-button-background** - The background color of the pager buttons. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-pager-button-font-size** - The font size of the pager buttons. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-pager-button-font-weight** - The font weight of the pager buttons. _(default: undefined)_

 - **base** - The main pager container.
- **first** - The first page button.
- **previous** - The previous page button.
- **next** - The next page button.
- **last** - The last page button.

elements.name: dap-ds-password-input
elements.description:
A password input a field for entering a password.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-change** - Fired when the input value changes.
- **dds-input** - Fired when the input value changes.
- **dds-keydown** - Fired when a key is pressed down.
- **dds-blur** - Fired when the input loses focus.
- **dds-focus** - Emitted when the input gains focus.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-input-height** - The height of the input. Default is var(--dds-spacing-1000). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-padding** - The padding of the input. Default is var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-font-size** - The font size of the input. Default is var(--dds-font-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-border-color** - The border color of the input. Default is var(--dds-border-neutral-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-background-color** - The background color of the input. Default is var(--dds-fields-background-default). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-text-color** - The text color of the input. Default is var(--dds-text-neutral-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-border-radius** - The border radius of the input. Default is var(--dds-radius-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-border-width** - The border width of the input. Default is var(--dds-border-width-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-disabled-background** - The background color of the disabled input. Default is var(--dds-fields-background-disabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-disabled-text** - The text color of the disabled input. Default is var(--dds-text-neutral-disabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-readonly-background** - The background color of the readonly input. Default is var(--dds-fields-background-read-only). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-readonly-text** - The text color of the readonly input. Default is var(--dds-text-neutral-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-success-border** - The border color of the success input. Default is var(--dds-border-positive-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-error-border** - The border color of the error input. Default is var(--dds-border-negative-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-addon-background** - The background color of the input addon. Default is var(--dds-background-ui-neutral-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-addon-success-background** - The background color of the success input addon. Default is var(--dds-background-ui-positive-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-input-addon-error-background** - The background color of the error input addon. Default is var(--dds-background-ui-negative-enabled). _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **postfix** - The postfix of the password input.
- **password-input** - The password input.
- **password-input--visible** - The visible password input.
- **icon** - The icon of the password input.
- **icon-base** - The base of the icon.

elements.name: dap-ds-popup
elements.description:
A popup is a container for popup content.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-opened** - Fired when the popup is opened.
- **dds-closed** - Fired when the popup is closed.
- **dds-close** - Fired when the popup should be closed.

### **Slots:**
 - **trigger** - The trigger of the popup.
- _default_ - The content of the popup.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-popup-z-index** - Z-index of the popup. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-popup-padding** - Default padding of the popup. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-popup-padding-xs** - Padding of the popup when size is xs. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-popup-padding-lg** - Padding of the popup when size is lg. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-popup-border-width** - Border width of the popup. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-popup-border-radius** - Border radius of the popup. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-popup-border-color** - Border color of the popup. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-popup-background** - Background color of the popup. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-popup-color** - Text color of the popup. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-popup-arrow-size** - Size of the popup arrow. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **popup** - The main popup container.
- **arrow** - The arrow of the popup.

elements.name: dap-ds-radio-button
elements.description:
A radio button is a graphical control element that allows the user to choose only one of a predefined set of mutually exclusive options.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-change** - Fired when the radio button is checked.
- **dds-blur** - Emitted when the radio button loses focus.
- **dds-focus** - Emitted when the radio button gains focus.
- **dds-input** - Emitted when the radio button receives input.

### **Methods:**
 - **focus(): _void_** - Programmatically focuses the radio button input element.
- **blur(): _void_** - Programmatically blurs the radio button input element.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-radio-size** - Sets the size of the radio button. Default: var(--dds-spacing-600) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-border-width** - Sets the border width of the radio button. Default: var(--dds-border-width-large) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-border-radius** - Sets the border radius of the radio button. Default: var(--dds-radius-rounded) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-border-color** - Sets the border color of the radio button. Default: var(--dds-border-neutral-base) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-background-color** - Sets the background color of the radio button. Default: var(--dds-background-neutral-base) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-hover-border-color** - Sets the border color of the radio button on hover. Default: var(--dds-border-neutral-medium) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-hover-background-color** - Sets the background color of the radio button on hover. Default: var(--dds-background-neutral-medium) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-active-border-color** - Sets the border color of the radio button when active. Default: var(--dds-border-neutral-strong) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-active-background-color** - Sets the background color of the radio button when active. Default: var(--dds-background-neutral-strong) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-checked-background-color** - Sets the background color of the checked radio button. Default: var(--dds-background-brand-base-inverted) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-checked-hover-background-color** - Sets the background color of the checked radio button on hover. Default: var(--dds-background-brand-medium-inverted) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-checked-active-background-color** - Sets the background color of the checked radio button when active. Default: var(--dds-background-brand-strong-inverted) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-disabled-background-color** - Sets the background color of the disabled radio button. Default: var(--dds-background-neutral-disabled) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-icon-background-color** - Sets the background color of the radio button icon. Default: var(--dds-transparent-white-strong-static) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-disabled-icon-background-color** - Sets the background color of the disabled radio button icon. Default: var(--dds-background-neutral-stronger) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-invalid-border-color** - Sets the border color of the invalid radio button. Default: var(--dds-border-negative-base) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-invalid-background-color** - Sets the background color of the invalid radio button. Default: var(--dds-background-negative-base) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-invalid-hover-border-color** - Sets the border color of the invalid radio button on hover. Default: var(--dds-border-negative-medium) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-invalid-hover-background-color** - Sets the background color of the invalid radio button on hover. Default: var(--dds-background-negative-medium) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-invalid-active-border-color** - Sets the border color of the invalid radio button when active. Default: var(--dds-border-negative-strong) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-invalid-active-background-color** - Sets the background color of the invalid radio button when active. Default: var(--dds-background-negative-strong) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-invalid-checked-background-color** - Sets the background color of the invalid checked radio button. Default: var(--dds-background-negative-base-inverted) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-invalid-checked-hover-background-color** - Sets the background color of the invalid checked radio button on hover. Default: var(--dds-background-negative-medium-inverted) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-invalid-checked-active-background-color** - Sets the background color of the invalid checked radio button when active. Default: var(--dds-background-negative-strong-inverted) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-icon-size** - Sets the size of the radio button icon. Default: var(--dds-spacing-300) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-readonly-border-color** - Sets the border color when the radio button is readonly. Default is `var(--dds-border-neutral-subtle)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-readonly-background-color** - Sets the background color when the radio button is readonly. Default is `var(--dds-background-neutral-subtle)`. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-radio-readonly-icon-color** - Sets the color of the radio button icon when readonly. Default is `var(--dds-text-neutral-base)`. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main radio button container.
- **wrapper** - The wrapper of the radio button.
- **base-label** - The main label container.
- **label** - The label of the radio button.
- **input** - The native input of the radio button.
- **control** - The control of the radio button.
- **label-container** - The label container of the radio button.
- **description** - The description of the radio button.

elements.name: dap-ds-scroll-area
elements.description:
A component that provides a customizable scrollable area with a custom scrollbar.
---


### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content to be scrolled

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-scroll-area-radius** - The border radius of the scroll area and its elements (default: var(--dds-radius-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-scroll-area-background** - The background color of the scroll area (default: var(--dds-background-neutral-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-scroll-area-scrollbar-background** - The background color of the scrollbar (default: var(--dds-background-neutral-subtle)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-scroll-area-thumb-background** - The background color of the scrollbar thumb (default: var(--dds-background-neutral-interactive)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-scroll-area-thumb-hover-background** - The background color of the scrollbar thumb on hover (default: var(--dds-background-neutral-interactive-hover)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-scroll-area-thumb-active-background** - The background color of the scrollbar thumb when active (default: var(--dds-background-neutral-interactive-active)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-scroll-area-transition** - The transition timing for scrollbar interactions (default: var(--dds-transition-fast) var(--dds-easing-ease-out)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-scroll-area-scrollbar-size** - The width/height of the scrollbar (default: 10px) _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **viewport** - The viewport element that contains the scrollable content
- **scrollbar** - The scrollbar container
- **corner** - The corner between vertical and horizontal scrollbars

elements.name: dap-ds-search
elements.description:
A select is a form element that allows the user to select one option from a set.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-change** - Fired when the search value changes.
- **dds-blur** - Emitted when the search loses focus.
- **dds-focus** - Emitted when the search gains focus.
- **dds-clear** - Emitted when the search is cleared.
- **dds-search** - Emitted when the search input value changes.
- **dds-input** - Emitted when typing happens in the search input.

### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The default slot for the options.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-combobox-padding-xs** - The padding for extra small size. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-padding-sm** - The padding for small size. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-padding-lg** - The padding for large size. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-padding-horizontal** - The horizontal padding. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-padding-vertical** - The vertical padding. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-gap** - The gap between elements. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-100). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-icon-gap** - The gap between icons. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-action-gap** - The gap between action elements. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-action-padding** - The padding for action elements. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-clear-icon-width** - The width of the clear icon. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-800). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-dropdown-icon-right** - The right position of the dropdown icon. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-600). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-combobox-min-width** - The minimum width of the combobox. Defaults to 7.5rem. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main search container.
- **trigger** - The trigger button of the search.
- **label** - The label of the search.
- **description** - The description of the search.
- **feedback** - The feedback of the search.
- **tooltip** - The tooltip of the search.
- **option-list** - The option list of the search.

elements.name: dap-ds-select
elements.description:
A select is a form element that allows the user to select one option from a set.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-change** - Fired when the select value changes.
- **dds-blur** - Emitted when the select loses focus.
- **dds-focus** - Emitted when the select gains focus.
- **dds-opened** - Emitted when the select dropdown is opened.
- **dds-closed** - Emitted when the select dropdown is closed.

### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The option list of the select.
- **indicator-icon** - The indicator icon of the select.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-select-min-height** - Minimum height of the select component (default: var(--dds-spacing-1000)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-padding** - Padding of the select component (default: var(--dds-spacing-300)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-column-gap** - Column gap of the select component (default: var(--dds-spacing-100)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-border-color** - Border color of the select component (default: var(--dds-border-neutral-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-border-radius** - Border radius of the select component (default: var(--dds-radius-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-bg-color** - Background color of the select component (default: var(--dds-background-neutral-subtle)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-text-color** - Text color of the select component (default: var(--dds-text-neutral-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-icon-right** - Right position of the icon (default: var(--dds-spacing-200)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-icon-color** - Color of the icon (default: var(--dds-icon-neutral-subtle)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-text-margin-right** - Right margin of the text (default: var(--dds-spacing-600)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-disabled-border-color** - Border color when disabled (default: var(--dds-background-neutral-stronger)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-disabled-bg-color** - Background color when disabled (default: var(--dds-background-neutral-stronger)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-disabled-text-color** - Text color when disabled (default: var(--dds-text-neutral-disabled)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-error-border-color** - Border color in error state (default: var(--dds-border-negative-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-success-border-color** - Border color in success state (default: var(--dds-border-positive-base)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-xs-min-height** - Minimum height for extra small size (default: var(--dds-spacing-800)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-xs-padding** - Padding for extra small size (default: var(--dds-spacing-200)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-xs-font-size** - Font size for extra small size (default: var(--dds-font-sm)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-lg-min-height** - Minimum height for large size (default: var(--dds-spacing-1200)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-lg-padding** - Padding for large size (default: var(--dds-spacing-400)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-lg-font-size** - Font size for large size (default: var(--dds-font-lg)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-lg-icon-right** - Right position of the icon for large size (default: var(--dds-spacing-300)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-lg-icon-color** - Color of the icon for large size (default: var(--dds-text-icon-neutral-subtle)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-select-popup-bg-color** - Background color of the popup (default: var(--dds-background-neutral-subtle)) _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main select container.
- **trigger** - The trigger button of the select.
- **label** - The label of the select.
- **description** - The description of the select.
- **feedback** - The feedback of the select.
- **tooltip** - The tooltip of the select.
- **option-list** - The option list of the select.

elements.name: dap-ds-snackbar-message
elements.description:
The Snackbar component shows a sliding message to the user.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-close** - Fires when the snackbar closes.

### **Slots:**
 - **default** - The content of the snackbar.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-snackbar-width** - Width of the snackbar. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-gap** - Gap between snackbar elements. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-padding** - Padding inside the snackbar. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-margin-bottom** - Bottom margin of the snackbar. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-transition** - Transition property for the snackbar. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-border-width** - Border width of the snackbar. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-border-radius** - Border radius of the snackbar. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-font-size** - Font size used in the snackbar. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-background** - Background color of the snackbar. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-border** - Border color of the snackbar. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-text** - Text color of the snackbar. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-icon** - Icon color of the snackbar. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-link** - Link color of the snackbar. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-information-background** - Background color for information variant. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-information-border** - Border color for information variant. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-information-icon** - Icon color for information variant. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-success-background** - Background color for success variant. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-success-border** - Border color for success variant. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-success-icon** - Icon color for success variant. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-error-background** - Background color for error variant. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-error-border** - Border color for error variant. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-error-icon** - Icon color for error variant. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-variant-text** - Text color for information, success, and error variants. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-variant-icon** - Icon color for information, success, and error variants. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-variant-link** - Link color for information, success, and error variants. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - Main snackbar container.
- **text** - The text part of the snackbar.
- **closebutton** - The close button part of the component.
- **icon** - The icon part of the close button.

elements.name: dap-ds-snackbar
elements.description:
The Snackbar is a container of sliding messages.
---


### **Methods:**
 - **show(message: _string_, options: _MessageOptionsType_): _void_** - Static method to show a snackbar message anywhere in the application
- **success(message: _string_, options: _Omit<MessageOptionsType, 'alertType'>_): _void_** - Static method to show a success message
- **error(message: _string_, options: _Omit<MessageOptionsType, 'alertType'>_): _void_** - Static method to show an error message
- **info(message: _string_, options: _Omit<MessageOptionsType, 'alertType'>_): _void_** - Static method to show an information message
- **default(message: _string_, options: _Omit<MessageOptionsType, 'alertType'>_): _void_** - Static method to show a default message
- **closeAll(): _void_** - Static method to close all snackbar messages globally
- **closeAll(): _void_** - Close all currently displayed messages

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-snackbar-spacing** - Spacing used for positioning the snackbar (default: var(--dds-spacing-400)) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-z-index** - Z-index of the snackbar container (default: 10000) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-pointer-events** - Pointer events behavior for the snackbar (default: auto) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-animation-duration** - Duration of entrance animations (default: 0.3s) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-snackbar-animation-timing** - Timing function for animations (default: ease-out) _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **host** - The host element

- **--dds-table-cell-padding-inline-end** - Padding for the end (right in LTR) of the cell. Default: var(--dds-spacing-500) _(default: undefined)_

- **--dds-table-cell-line-height** - Line height of the cell text. Default: 1.5 _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-table-cell-text-align** - Text alignment in the cell. Default: left _(default: undefined)_

elements.name: dap-ds-textarea
elements.description:
A textarea is a multi-line text input field.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-count-change** - Fires when the count of the textarea changes.
- **dds-change** - Fired when the textarea value changes.
- **dds-input** - Fired when the textarea value changes.
- **dds-keydown** - Fired when a key is pressed down.
- **dds-blur** - Fired when the textarea loses focus.
- **dds-focus** - Emitted when the textarea gains focus.
- **dds-select** - Emitted when select text in textarea.

### **Slots:**
 - **feedback-icon** - The custom icon of the feedback.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-textarea-min-rows** - Minimum number of rows in the textarea. Default is 2. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-textarea-spacing** - Gap between elements in the textarea container. Default is var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-textarea-gap** - Gap between elements in the textarea container. Default is var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-textarea-margin-top** - Top margin of the textarea. Default is var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-textarea-padding** - Padding of the textarea control. Default is var(--dds-spacing-200) var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-textarea-border-width** - Border width of the textarea. Default is var(--dds-border-width-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-textarea-border-color** - Border color of the textarea. Default is var(--dds-border-neutral-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-textarea-background** - Background color of the textarea. Default is var(--dds-fields-background-default). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-textarea-color** - Text color of the textarea. Default is var(--dds-text-neutral-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-textarea-border-radius** - Border radius of the textarea. Default is var(--dds-radius-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-textarea-disabled-bg** - Background color when disabled. Default is var(--dds-fields-background-disabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-textarea-disabled-color** - Text color when disabled. Default is var(--dds-text-neutral-disabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-textarea-readonly-bg** - Background color when readonly. Default is var(--dds-fields-background-read-only). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-textarea-readonly-color** - Text color when readonly. Default is var(--dds-text-neutral-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-textarea-error-border** - Border color when in error state. Default is var(--dds-border-negative-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-textarea-success-border** - Border color when in success state. Default is var(--dds-border-positive-base). _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main textarea container.
- **input** - The native input of the textarea.
- **counter** - The counter of the textarea.
- **counter-base** - The base of the counter.
- **feedback** - The feedback of the textarea.
- **feedback-base** - The base of the feedback.
- **feedback-text** - The text of the feedback.
- **feedback-icon** - The icon of the feedback.

elements.name: dap-ds-time-grid
elements.description:
A time grid component that allows users to select hours and minutes in two side-by-side scrollable columns.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-change** - Fired when time selection changes.
- **dds-close** - Fired when the time grid should close.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-time-grid-gap** - The gap between time sections (default: var(--dds-spacing-400)). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-time-grid-padding** - The padding around the time grid (default: var(--dds-spacing-0)). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-time-grid-column-gap** - The gap between time buttons in columns (default: var(--dds-spacing-200)). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-time-grid-border-radius** - The border radius of the time grid (default: var(--dds-radius-base)). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-time-grid-background** - The background color of the time grid (default: var(--dds-background-neutral-subtle)). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-time-grid-transition** - The transition timing for the time grid (default: all 0.2s ease-in-out). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-time-grid-max-width** - The maximum width of the time grid (default: 400px). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-time-grid-column-max-height** - The maximum height of time columns (default: 240px). _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **time-grid** - The main time grid container.
- **hour-section** - The hour selection section.
- **minute-section** - The minute selection section.
- **time-button** - Individual time selection buttons.
- **section-header-title** - The title of the section header.
- **section-header-divider** - The divider between the section header and the time buttons.
- **time-column** - The time column container.

elements.name: dap-ds-timepicker
elements.description:
A timepicker is a graphical user interface widget that allows the user to select a time from a time range.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-change** - Fired when the timepicker value changes.
- **dds-input** - Fired when the timepicker input value changes.
- **dds-valid-time** - Fired when the timepicker input value is valid. Happens on manual input typing.
- **dds-invalid-time** - Fired when the timepicker input value is invalid. Happens on manual input typing.
- **dds-clear** - Fired when the timepicker is cleared.
- **dds-focus** - Emitted when the timepicker gains focus.
- **dds-blur** - Emitted when the timepicker loses focus.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-timepicker-background** - The background color of the timepicker. Defaults to var(--dds-fields-background-default). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-border-color** - The border color of the timepicker. Defaults to var(--dds-border-neutral-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-border-width** - The border width of the timepicker. Defaults to var(--dds-border-width-base, 1px). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-border-radius** - The border radius of the timepicker. Defaults to var(--dds-radius-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-text-color** - The text color of the timepicker. Defaults to var(--dds-text-neutral-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-placeholder-color** - The placeholder text color. Defaults to var(--dds-text-neutral-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-disabled-background** - The background color when disabled. Defaults to var(--dds-background-neutral-stronger). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-disabled-text** - The text color when disabled. Defaults to var(--dds-text-neutral-disabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-error-border** - The border color for error state. Defaults to var(--dds-border-negative-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-success-border** - The border color for success state. Defaults to var(--dds-border-positive-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-icon-color** - The color of the icons. Defaults to var(--dds-text-icon-neutral-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-clear-icon-color** - The color of the clear icon. Defaults to var(--dds-button-subtle-icon-neutral-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-popup-background** - The background color of the popup. Defaults to var(--dds-background-neutral-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-popup-shadow** - The box shadow of the popup. Defaults to 0 4px 6px -1px rgb(0 0 0 / 8%), 0 2px 4px -1px rgb(0 0 0 / 6%). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-padding-xs** - The padding for extra small size. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-padding-sm** - The padding for small size. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-padding-lg** - The padding for large size. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-padding-horizontal** - The horizontal padding. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-padding-vertical** - The vertical padding. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-gap** - The gap between elements. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-100). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-icon-gap** - The gap between icons. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-action-gap** - The gap between action elements. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-action-padding** - The padding for action elements. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-clear-icon-width** - The width of the clear icon. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-800). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-dropdown-icon-right** - The right position of the dropdown icon. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-600). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-timepicker-min-width** - The minimum width of the timepicker. Defaults to 7.5rem. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main timepicker container.
- **trigger** - The trigger button of the timepicker.
- **label** - The label of the timepicker.
- **description** - The description of the timepicker.
- **feedback** - The feedback of the timepicker.
- **tooltip** - The tooltip of the timepicker.
- **input** - The input of the timepicker.
- **clear-button** - The clear button of the timepicker.

elements.name: dap-ds-toc
elements.description:
A table of contents (TOC) is a list of links that allows users to quickly navigate to sections within a document.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-anchor-change** - Event that is triggered when the anchor changes.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-toc-border-width** - Width of the TOC border. Default: var(--dds-border-width-base) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toc-border-color** - Color of the TOC border. Default: var(--dds-border-neutral-divider) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toc-title-color** - Color of the TOC title. Default: var(--dds-text-neutral-strong) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toc-title-font-size** - Font size of the TOC title. Default: var(--dds-font-base) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toc-title-font-weight** - Font weight of the TOC title. Default: var(--dds-font-weight-bold) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toc-title-line-height** - Line height of the TOC title. Default: 1.25 _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toc-link-color** - Color of the TOC links. Default: var(--dds-button-subtle-text-neutral-enabled) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toc-link-active-color** - Color of the active TOC link. Default: var(--dds-button-subtle-text-enabled) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toc-link-border-color** - Border color of the active TOC link. Default: var(--dds-border-brand-base) _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toc-link-line-height** - Line height of the TOC links. Default: 1.2 _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toc-link-padding** - Padding of the TOC links. Default: var(--dds-spacing-200) _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main container of the toc.

elements.name: dap-ds-toggle-button
elements.description:
A toggle button is a button that can be toggled on (active) or off (inactive).
---


### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the toggle button.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-toggle-button-min-width-lg** - Minimum width of the large toggle button _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-min-width-md** - Minimum width of the medium toggle button _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-min-width-sm** - Minimum width of the small toggle button _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-min-width-xs** - Minimum width of the extra small toggle button _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-height-lg** - Height of the large toggle button _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-height-md** - Height of the medium toggle button _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-height-sm** - Height of the small toggle button _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-height-xs** - Height of the extra small toggle button _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-padding-lg** - Padding of the large toggle button _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-padding-md** - Padding of the medium toggle button _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-padding-sm** - Padding of the small toggle button _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-padding-xs** - Padding of the extra small toggle button _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-font-size-lg** - Font size of the large toggle button _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-font-size-md** - Font size of the medium toggle button _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-font-size-sm** - Font size of the small toggle button _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-font-size-xs** - Font size of the extra small toggle button _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-border-enabled** - Border color in enabled state _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-background-enabled** - Background color in enabled state _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-content-enabled** - Content/text color in enabled state _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-border-hover** - Border color in hover state _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-background-hover** - Background color in hover state _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-border-pressed** - Border color in pressed state _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-background-pressed** - Background color in pressed state _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-background-selected-enabled** - Background color in selected enabled state _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-content-selected-enabled** - Content/text color in selected enabled state _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-background-selected-hover** - Background color in selected hover state _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-background-selected-pressed** - Background color in selected pressed state _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-border-disabled** - Border color in disabled state _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-background-disabled** - Background color in disabled state _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-content-disabled** - Content/text color in disabled state _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-highcontrast-border** - High contrast border color _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-toggle-button-highcontrast-border-hover** - High contrast border color on hover _(default: undefined)_

- **high-contrast** - The high contrast part of the button.

elements.name: dap-ds-tooltip
elements.description:
A tooltip is a container for tooltip content.
---


### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the tooltip.
- **trigger** - The trigger element of the tooltip.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-tooltip-max-width** - The maximum width of the tooltip before its content will wrap. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-tooltip-padding** - The padding inside the tooltip. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-tooltip-border-color** - The border color of the tooltip. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-tooltip-bg-color** - The background color of the tooltip. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-tooltip-text-color** - The text color of the tooltip. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-tooltip-font-size** - The font size of the tooltip text. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-tooltip-box-shadow** - The box shadow of the tooltip. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main tooltip container.
- **trigger** - The trigger element of the tooltip.
- **popup** - The popup of the tooltip.
- **arrow** - The arrow of the tooltip.

elements.name: dap-ds-tray
elements.description:
A tray is a container for slide in content.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-before-open** - Fires before the tray opens.
- **dds-opened** - Fires after the tray opens.
- **dds-before-close** - Fires before the tray closes.
- **dds-closed** - Fires after the tray closed.
- **dds-close** - Fires when the tray is closes. You can prevent the tray from closing by calling `event.preventDefault()`.

### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the tray.
- **header** - The header of the tray.
- **footer** - The footer of the tray.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-modal-max-block-size** - Maximum height of the modal. Default: 80vh. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-max-inline-size** - Maximum width of the modal. Default: 600px. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-padding** - Padding inside the modal. Default: var(--dds-spacing-800). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-transform-amount** - Amount to transform for entrance animation. Default: 2rem. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-transition-speed** - Speed of transition animations. Default: var(--dds-transition-fast). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-transition-timing** - Timing function for transitions. Default: var(--dds-easing-ease-in-out). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-border-width** - Border width of the modal. Default: var(--dds-border-width-base). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-border-color** - Border color of the modal. Default: var(--dds-border-neutral-divider). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-border-radius** - Border radius of the modal. Default: var(--dds-radius-large, 16px). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-background** - Background color of the modal. Default: var(--dds-background-neutral-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-header-margin** - Margin below the header. Default: var(--dds-spacing-800). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-footer-margin** - Margin above the footer. Default: var(--dds-spacing-400). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-footer-gap** - Gap between footer elements. Default: var(--dds-spacing-400). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-modal-close-margin** - Margin for the close button. Default: var(--dds-spacing-300). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-tray-width-side** - Width of the side (left/right) trays. Default: 250px. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-tray-min-width-horizontal** - Minimum width of the horizontal (top/bottom) trays. Default: 400px. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-tray-min-height-horizontal** - Minimum height of the horizontal (top/bottom) trays. Default: 300px. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-tray-min-height-vertical** - Minimum height of the vertical (left/right) trays. Default: 100%. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-tray-transform-duration** - Duration of the transform animation. Default: 0.3s. _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-tray-transform-timing** - Timing function for the transform animation. Default: ease-in-out. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main tray container.
- **panel** - The panel of the tray.
- **header** - The header of the tray.
- **footer** - The footer of the tray.
- **body** - The body of the tray.
