properties.name: bodyAs
properties.description: The html element of the body typography.

properties.name: customClass
properties.description: The custom class of the typography.

properties.name: anchor
properties.description: Whether the typography is an anchor for the TOC component.

elements.name: dap-ds-form-label
elements.description:
A form label is a container for labels in a form.
---


### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--dds-form-label-font-weight** - Font weight of the label. Defaults to var(--dds-font-weight-bold). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-form-label-line-height** - Line height of the label. Defaults to var(--dds-font-line-height-xlarge). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-form-label-color** - Text color of the label. Defaults to var(--dds-text-neutral-enabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-form-label-disabled-color** - Text color when the label is disabled. Defaults to var(--dds-text-neutral-disabled). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-form-label-required-color** - Color of the required indicator. Defaults to var(--dds-text-negative-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-form-label-optional-color** - Color of the optional indicator. Defaults to var(--dds-text-neutral-subtle). _(default: undefined)_
- **--dds-form-label-margin-bottom** - Bottom margin of the label. Defaults to var(--dds-spacing-200). _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main form label container.
- **required** - The required indicator of the form label.
- **optional** - The optional indicator of the form label.

attributes.name: for
attributes.description: The id of the form element that the label is associated with.

attributes.name: renderAs
attributes.description: Whether the label should be rendered as text or a <label> tag. Default is label.

properties.name: for
properties.description: The id of the form element that the label is associated with.

properties.name: renderAs
properties.description: Whether the label should be rendered as text or a <label> tag. Default is label.

properties.name: optionalLabel
properties.description: Label of optional text

properties.name: subtle
properties.description: Text weight of the label.

properties.name: optional
properties.description: If the label is optional.

properties.name: required
properties.description: If the label is required.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The label text.

elements.name: dap-ds-input-group
elements.description:
An input group is a container for inputs.
---


### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the input group items.
- **feedback-icon** - The custom icon of the feedback.

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main input group container.
- **label** - The label of the input group.
- **description** - The description of the input group.
- **tooltip** - The tooltip of the input group.
- **container** - The container of the input group items.

slots.description: The content of the input group items.

slots.name: feedback-icon
slots.description: The custom icon of the feedback.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The label of the input group.

properties.name: description
properties.description: The description of the input group.

properties.name: tooltip
properties.description: The tooltip of the input group.

properties.name: tooltipPlacement
properties.description: The tooltip placement of the input group.

properties.name: tooltipAriaLabel
properties.description: The aria label of the tooltip.

properties.name: optionalLabel
properties.description: The label of the input group when it is optional.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Whether the input group is disabled.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the input group. Default is `sm`. Can be `sm` or `lg`.

properties.name: required
properties.description: Whether the input group is required.

properties.name: optional
properties.description: Whether the input group is optional.

properties.name: feedback
properties.description: The feedback of the input.

properties.name: feedbackType
properties.description: The type of the feedback.

properties.name: subtle
properties.description: Whether the input group label is subtle.

elements.name: dap-ds-radio-group
elements.description:
A radio group is a form element that allows the user to select one option from a set.
---


### **Events:**
 - **dds-change** - Fired when the radio group is checked.
- **dds-blur** - Emitted when the radio group loses focus.
- **dds-focus** - Emitted when the radio group gains focus.

### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the radio group.
- **feedback-icon** - The custom icon of the feedback.

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The main radio group container.
- **label** - The label of the radio group.
- **tooltip** - The tooltip of the radio group.
- **container** - The container of the radio group items.

attributes.description: The tooltip placement of the radio group.

attributes.name: optionalLabel
attributes.description: Text of optional label.
